testcase.name: Verify whether User is able to access - VMS Application MSP User
Release Job to supplier/s MSP User

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given Log back in as the MSP User, click on the briefcase icon on the left navigation panel and from the flyout window select View All jobs.passed Then Click on the Job title of the Job you're working on....................passed Then Job Details should open and you will find an actions button on the top right corner of the screen;.passed Then select Distribute......................................................passed Then This will bring the user to the distribute tab and the user can type to search the vendors.pending Then Once added, Click on Enbale Submission Limit toggle to set it ON or OFF.skipped Then Click on Distribute....................................................skipped
